# GRAPHICS::IS_ACTIVE_SCALEFORM_MOVIE_DELETING

## Summary
Returns true or false on whether an active scaleform movie is deleting

## Parameters
* **SCALEFORM_INDEX** scaleformMovieId

## Returns
* **BOOL**

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
val is 1-20 (0 will return false)
